name: Magician (itch)
description:
This game is about witches who fly to collect good pumpkins, in this game there are also a pumpkins trap that can reduce the number of players and can even lead to game over players, so to get the highest score in this game should get a good pumpkins and also avoid another pumpkins.
To be able to continue to fly to get pumpkins players should not fall or fly too high to exceed the screen because it also makes the game over, and when the game over there in getting the score during the game.
